Likelihood

Main.MCPhylo.FelsensteinFunction — Method

FelsensteinFunction(treepostorder::Vector{N}, pi::T, rates::Vector{Float64}, data::Array{Float64,3}, n_c::Int64, blv::Vector{Float64}) where {T<:Real, N<:GeneralNode}

This function calculates the log-likelihood of an evolutiuonary model using the Felsensteins pruning algorithm.

The function is written such that it is differentiable by Zygote 0.5.3.

source
